1. 基本模板

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="renderer" content="webkit">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <title></title>
    <!-- WARNING: Respond.js doesn't work if you view the page via file:// -->
    <!-- HTML5 Shim and Respond.js IE8 support of HTML5 elements and media queries -->
    <!--[if lte IE 8]>
    <script src="../../../dev/modules/lib/ie/respond.js"></script>
    <script src="../../../dev/modules/lib/ie/html5shiv.js"></script>
    <![endif]-->

    <link rel="stylesheet" href="../../../dev/modules/ui/css/pku.css"/>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/main.css"/><!-- custom stylesheet -->

    <script data-main="../../modules/" src="../../modules/require.js"></script>
    <script >
        var VERSION,
            DEV_MODE
            ;
        DEV_MODE = true;
        VERSION = DEV_MODE ? (new Date()).getTime() : "v1.0";
        require.config( {
            urlArgs: "VERSION=" + VERSION,
            paths: {
                "jquery": "jquery/jquery-1.11.3",
                "doT": "utils/doT",
                "bootstrap": "lib/bootstrap/js/bootstrap",
                "code-pretty": "lib/pretty/prettify.min"
            },
            map: {
                '*': {
                    'css': 'utils/css/css',
                    'text': 'utils/text'
                }
            },
            shim : {
                "bootstrap": [ "jquery" ],
                "code-pretty": [ "css!lib/pretty/prettify.css" ]
            },
            // 超时
            waitSeconds: 15
        } );
        require( [ "code-pretty", "./js/main.js" ] );
    </script>
</head>
<body>

</body>
</html>

3. <meta>

1）<meta charset="UTF-8">

    设置浏览器解析html文件时使用的字符集

2）<meta name="renderer" content="webkit">

    国内浏览器厂商一般都支持兼容模式（即 IE 内核）和高速模式（即 webkit 内核），
    不幸的是，所有国产浏览器都是默认使用兼容模式，
    可使用上面的meta标签可以让部分国产浏览器默认采用高速模式渲染页面。

3）<meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1">

    让 IE 浏览器运行最新的渲染模式下

4）<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

    禁止缩放，且不让浏览器假装自己是960px的宽度

4. IE8 兼容

<!-- WARNING: Respond.js doesn't work if you view the page via file:// -->
<!-- HTML5 Shim and Respond.js IE8 support of HTML5 elements and media queries -->
<!--[if lte IE 8]>
<script src="../../../dev/modules/lib/ie/respond.js"></script>
<script src="../../../dev/modules/lib/ie/html5shiv.js"></script>
<![endif]-->

1）respond.js

    让IE8支持媒介查询，进而支持响应式

2）html5shiv.js

    让IE8识别HTML5中新增的标签，如 <main>、<section>
